title: Having trouble signing in :c
body: I went to go sign it but iz not letting me it say "did not receive a response from the server" (retrying 1) then 2 and 3 then says the error message

replies.body:
The login server did not respond. You may have a connection issue that is not related to the League of Legends server. See our current Service Status here: http://status.leagueoflegends.com

If you are still unable to connect, please check the following Knowledge Base article: support.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201761944

Still unable to connect? Contact Player Support at support.riotgames.com



This is the message that i get
Did you already work through the steps in the link both the message and *Rineyy* sent you?
Hi thank you so much. from the link you gave me it turns out my internet explorer had a virus and it wont work so I just downloaded Mozilla Firefox and I logged right in ^^

We definitely don’t want you to miss the party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

If you continue to experience login issues after performing these steps, please screenshot the error, upload it and post it here. 

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4hsbxlb85qU/VRqK0_slEZI/AAAAAAAAnDE/bBjnYxLhpOs/s1600/AmumuLoadScreen_8.png
